snippet: The producer Beth Morrison’s work for emerging voices in opera has led to her involvement with festivals in New York and, now, the Los Angeles Opera.
abstract: Producer Beth Morrison has been fostering opera with emerging creative voices since her arrival in New York City in 2005; her festival Prototype: Opera/Theater/Now has just opened it's second season.
lead_paragraph: The producer Beth Morrison’s work for emerging voices in opera has led to her involvement with festivals in New York and, now, the Los Angeles Opera.

headline.seo: Beth Morrison, Opera Producer With Prototype Festival
headline.main: Ears for Opera, Eyes on the Future
headline.print_headline: Ears for Opera, Eyes on the Future
